dict.string: # This requires that 'enable access for assistive devices' is enabled # open -a Safari "$TM_FILEPATH" osascript -e 'activate application "Safari.app"' -e 'tell application "System Events"' -e ' tell process "Safari"' -e ' keystroke "i" using {command down}' -e ' end tell' -e 'end tell' -e 'tell the application "Safari" to close window 1'
